title.rendered: “IDF Launches Decisive Strikes Against Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: A Comprehensive Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked in Lebanon since this morning

Starting from this morning, the IDF has been attacking targets in Lebanon.

The air force’s fighter jets attacked terror infrastructure and military buildings of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Chouf region of Lebanon a short while ago.

An IDF tank fired to remove a threat identified in the Itha Al-Sha’b area of Lebanon. In addition, artillery forces fired to remove a threat to the Al-Dahira area.

IDF fighters attacked a military building in Marjayoun, following the detection of a terror cell.

Moreover, a missile launch from Lebanon towards Galadulah region was identified, IDF forces attacked the sources of the fire.

Attached video documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/48GkxAP
